title: Ring Pop Individually Wrapped Bulk 20 Count Lollipop Variety Christmas Holiday Party Pack ‚Äî Lollipop Suckers w/ Assorted Flavors - Fun Candy for Holiday Parties and Stocking Stuffers
description: Ring Pop is the ultimate iconic wearable lollipop hard candy to hand out this holiday season, with an enormous eye-catching candy gem that's so deliciously playful, the fun never ends! Deliciously festive, this hard candy is adored by kids and adults alike, making it ideal for sharing with family and friends during the holidays! These shelf-stable treats can also add a fun twist to holiday celebrations! Vibrantly colorful and unique, Ring Pops add an extra level of fun to holiday parties and are the perfect lollipop snack to stuff Christmas stockings with. These shelf-stable candies are great for any kid's holiday candy bags! Ring Pop bulk variety packs are the ultimate candy for holiday parties, with a wide assortment of fruity flavors loved by adults and kids alike! They also make deliciously fun individually wrapped fillers for a holiday party favor candy bag, and make great holiday decorations! Celebrate Christmas, Hanukkah, Kwanza, or New Year's with Ring Pop, because these lollipop assortments are great for any kid's holiday candy bags and make great stocking stuffers or candy gifts. So, what are you waiting for? Brighten up your next big holiday party with this iconic holiday sucker. Each lollipop variety bag includes 20 individually-wrapped Ring Pop gem candy lollipops in a selection of 5 assorted flavors, with everyone's classic mouthwatering favorites - Strawberry, Blue Raspberry, Cherry, Watermelon, and Twisted Berry Blast. Unwrap the fun at your next Christmas party, and share in the jolly fun with your favorite flavor from this 20-count variety pack! Ring Pop candy lollipops make an excellent gift candy, ideal for sharing with friends and other Christmas party-goers! Keep them in your pantry for a tasty snack, or a delicious holiday candy treat. Bring a bag to your Christmas party or gathering! Our holiday candy mix is shelf-stable and long-lasting. Disclaimer: Not for children 3 and under.

reviews.name: Roshana Munoz
reviews.review: Such a great price for ring pops! This was for a wedding. The kids loved wearing them (even some adults).

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.review: I brought this because I wanted to try all the flavors of ring pops. So far I only tried 2 flavors, they were alright I guess. Once I try all the flavors I will give the rest to my little cousins to make them happy. I suggest you buy bc they are cheap. Anywho- have a fantastic wonderful dayyy!! ;D

reviews.name: marlene
reviews.review: I used this product for goodie bag stuffers ! Loved that I only had to purchase one bag with the amount that came in bag & who doesn‚Äôt love ring pops!

reviews.name: J
reviews.review: I love ring pops! For the price I do feel this was perfect but waiting about 5 days for it caught me off guard, but what can we doü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. Some were broken but I didn‚Äôt expect all to be in tact when hopped from place to place. Love these!

reviews.name: Stephanie
reviews.review: I ordered these to hand out to the kids on Halloween. Great value, and they were the first to go over the chocolate and play dough.

reviews.name: Sage
reviews.review: Overall, these were great for Halloween and incentives for kids... Until they opened theirs up to a pile of hard sugar pieces. Most were totally fine but had a few that had seen better days.

reviews.name: MelissaAdel
reviews.review: Bought this pack because our XC girls won State and we used them as pretend State rings for a photo.

reviews.name: Lorena Mathis
reviews.review: These are cute to add on kids stockings and for Halloween. But some of them were broken and also the flavor wasnt as good as I expected it.

title: Ring Pop Hard Candy Pops, Variety Pack, 44 Count
description: With over 40 years of history, Ring Pops remain a pop culture icon that every generation loves. These tangy, sweet gemstones atop a plastic, expandable ring fit nearly any finger, with a handy disc to keep dribbles away from your fingers. This item remains a top-ranked candy offering and has a proven track record as a top seller. It's ideal for all occasions including convenience stores, concessions, vending machines, offices, parties and pantries. Features 44 individually wrapped Ring Pops in each jar, including new Ring Pop Sours.

reviews.name: Jason McMillan
reviews.review: Great flavor and my grandkids love them.

reviews.name: April L
reviews.reviewTitle: Ring pops were a big hit
reviews.review: The wedding guests loved them! They were a huge hit.

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.review: My adult daughter and I had a pirate themed Halloween to pass out candy. We dressed as pirates and gave plastic beaded necklaces, chocolate gold coins, and the ring pops out of a "treasure chest". The ring pops were greatly appreciated by the trick-or-treaters. I was happy with the price and they came in plenty of time.

reviews.name: Keshun Milligan
reviews.reviewTitle: If you like all the flavors it‚Äôs definitely a GREAT buy.
reviews.review: I wish they would make a whole box of the Blue Raspberry or Raspberry Watermelon flavor. So out of 44 ring pops I kept about 12-14 & gave the rest away.

reviews.review: These were a hit, I added them to a candy buffet for my sons graduation party, and everyone loved the flavors, hadn't eaten these since I was a kid

Package says 4 but only contained only 3.

reviews.name: Emily
reviews.review: There was a great assortment of candy. It had something for everyone. Was perfect for Halloween.

reviews.name: Helvi Hellion
reviews.reviewTitle: Good mix. The children liked it.
reviews.review: We bought this for a pinata. The kids really liked it. Seemed like we should have gotten a bit more for the money.

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.review: Taste is great

reviews.name: ForeverYOUNG
reviews.review:
I am a huge tootsie roll fan and that is bulk of what is in this mix, but I also love Dots and mini sugar daddy suckers - which were a surprise because I didn't see the mini sugar daddies in the photo on the ad. Everything else is... well... 'ok.' A lot of Charm suckers (with bubble gum in the center) - YUCK. I toss those.
But to each his own! Maybe you like them! All are fresh enough and tasty. I rarely buy these, but love the small sizes = less guilt. The bag arrived in great shape along with other stuff I had ordered. I never hesitate to update my reviews should new info seem useful.

reviews.name: Stacy M
reviews.review: I received this product with a timely delivery and it isn't the best, but it definitely does the job. I would buy it again.

reviews.name: Ryan
reviews.review: They are fresh and soft. The expiration date on the package is December 21st 2023. They were 100% red.

reviews.name: Becky Tittle
reviews.review: How can you not like them? What I was most impressed by is how fresh they are.

reviews.name: Lisa
reviews.review: They shipped quickly and they were soft to chew. The price was too expensive, but I needed orange candy quick. Satisfied
